statements: SELECT user_id, user_name, age, gender, location, political_affiliation FROM user_demographics;
SELECT user_name, age, gender, location FROM user_demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM user_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT user_name, location FROM user_demographics WHERE political_affiliation = 'Conservative';
SELECT user_id, age, gender, political_affiliation FROM user_demographics WHERE age BETWEEN 18 AND 25;
SELECT * FROM user_demographics WHERE gender='Male' ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT user_name, age FROM user_demographics WHERE age >= 30 ORDER BY user_name ASC
SELECT user_name, political_affiliation FROM user_demographics WHERE location='New York' ORDER BY political_affiliation DESC
SELECT user_name, age, gender FROM user_demographics WHERE political_affiliation='Democrat' ORDER BY age DESC, gender ASC
SELECT * FROM user_demographics WHERE location LIKE '%California%' AND age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY user_name
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT username, location FROM users WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT user_id, age FROM users ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM political_content WHERE political_party = 'Democratic';
SELECT user_id, content, engagement_count FROM political_content ORDER BY engagement_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, location FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT username, age, location FROM users JOIN political_content ON users.user_id = political_content.user_id WHERE political_party = 'Republican' AND age >= 25;
SELECT post_id, content, engagement_count FROM political_content WHERE engagement_count > 1000 ORDER BY engagement_count DESC;
SELECT username, location FROM users WHERE username = 'John' UNION SELECT username, location FROM users WHERE username = 'Sarah';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, age FROM users ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT username, location FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, username, location FROM users WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT post_id, post_content, post_date FROM political_posts ORDER BY post_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY age DESC, username ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT COUNT(user_id) AS total_users FROM users WHERE age > 30;

SELECT u.username, p.post_content, pi.interaction_type FROM users u JOIN political_posts p ON u.user_id = p.user_id JOIN post_interactions pi ON u.user_id = pi.user_id WHERE u.location = 'USA' ORDER BY pi.interaction_date DESC;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(p.post_id) AS total_posts FROM users u LEFT JOIN political_posts p ON u.user_id = p.user_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING total_posts > 5;

SELECT p.post_content, COUNT(pi.interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM political_posts p LEFT JOIN post_interactions pi ON p.post_id = pi.post_id GROUP BY p.post_content ORDER BY total_interactions DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, age FROM users ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT user_id, gender FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM posts WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM reactions WHERE reaction_type = 'Like' ORDER BY reaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT username, age FROM users WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM posts WHERE post_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY post_date ASC;
SELECT u.username, c.comment_content FROM users u JOIN comments c ON u.user_id = c.user_id WHERE u.age < 25 ORDER BY c.comment_date DESC;
SELECT r.reaction_type, COUNT(r.reaction_id) AS total_reactions FROM reactions r GROUP BY r.reaction_type ORDER BY total_reactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, age, gender FROM users WHERE age > 25;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(user_id) AS post_count FROM posts GROUP BY user_id HAVING post_count > 5;
SELECT post_id, post_content, likes_count FROM posts WHERE likes_count < 10 ORDER BY likes_count DESC;
SELECT user_id, gender, location FROM demographics WHERE political_affiliation = 'Liberal';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, age, location FROM users WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age;
SELECT post_content, post_date, likes_count FROM posts WHERE post_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY likes_count DESC;
SELECT u.username, p.post_content, c.comment_content FROM users u JOIN posts p ON u.user_id = p.user_id JOIN comments c ON p.post_id = c.post_id WHERE u.location = 'New York';
SELECT d.age_group, d.gender, COUNT(*) AS user_count FROM demographics d GROUP BY d.age_group, d.gender HAVING user_count > 5 ORDER BY user_count DESC;
